participant_1.name: Jamie
participant_1.personality: Determined and resilient, Jamie has a strong sense of responsibility and a competitive spirit.
participant_1.background: i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my mom passed away when i was young. i love playing softball.

participant_2.name: Rayed
participant_2.personality: Rebellious but still hopeful, Rayed is navigating challenges with a sense of humor and a desire for change.
participant_2.background: my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow. i'm here for shoplifting. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month.

content.text: Hello I am rayed from Florida
Hi ray, I am rayed from Florida. What kind do you like?
